main_definition: daring, confident or unconventional behavior; a linguistic expression used to convey such qualities.

meanings_and_examples.example: The firefighter made a bold move to save the child from the burning building.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Strong, vivid colors or impressive visual appearance
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist's bold use of red and yellow in this painting caught everyone's attention.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not hesitant to speak one's mind or act on a decision
meanings_and_examples.example: She spoke her mind boldly, even though it was risky to do so in such a formal setting.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Standing out due to distinctiveness or unconventional nature
meanings_and_examples.example: The new restaurant's bold menu design set it apart from other eateries in the area.
